sentences.en: A feedback AC capacitance measurement circuit of gain controllable is developed.
sentences.cn: 分析、设计了程控增益负反馈交流型电容测量电路.

sentences.en: Among the many regulatory substances in use we have controllable and selective herbicides.
sentences.cn: 在所有的许多调节物质中,有控制性的和选择性的除草剂.

sentences.en: Conclusion Behcet syndrome is a kind of controllable cutaneous vasculitis.
sentences.cn: 结论白塞综合征是可以控制的一种皮肤血管炎病.

sentences.en: Controllable silicon circuit, digital display, accurate and precise control.
sentences.cn: 了控硅电路, 数码显示, 控制精确可靠.

sentences.en: CST is one kind advanced controllable starting transfer system.
sentences.cn: CST是一种先进的可控启动传输系统.

sentences.en: Cutting - edge technology creates breathtaking 3 D views with controllable sun angle and shadows.
sentences.cn: 使用最前沿的技术创建令人惊叹的具有可控制阳光角度和阴影的三维图像.

sentences.en: Diabetes is a serious but controllable disease.
sentences.cn: 糖尿病是一种严重但可以控制的疾病。

sentences.en: Identify your fears. Categorize them as controllable or uncontrollable and confront them.
sentences.cn: 正视你自身的恐惧. 将之划分为“可控的”和“不可控的”,并解决它.

sentences.en: Import and export less controllable, as external demand and external conditions.
sentences.cn: 进出口可控性较少, 因为外需,外部条件的原因.

sentences.en: Insulated Gate Bipolar Transistor ( IGBT ) as controllable switch, has been applied widely.
sentences.cn: 绝缘栅双极二级管 ( IGBT ) 作为一种可控开关, 获得了广泛应用.

sentences.en: It is in creating the artificial and controllable that science excels.
sentences.cn: 有两种局限性制约着预测能力的发展.

sentences.en: Somethoughts also provided for the studies of controllable compensation.
sentences.cn: 本方案的提出也为可控补偿的研究提供一定的思路.

sentences.en: The paper introduces the feature and application of CST controllable transport system.
sentences.cn: 本文介绍了CST可控传输系统的性能并对其应用情况作出评述.

sentences.en: This makes the surfboards more controllable.
sentences.cn: 这会让冲浪板更好控制。

sentences.en: Type A H 1 N 1 influenza is preventable, controllable and curable.
sentences.cn: 甲型H1N1流感可防 、 可控、可治.

sentences.en: With PWM modulating technique, two high DC voltage controllable powers are generated.
sentences.cn: 利用PWM调制技术, 分别得到两个可控的高压直流电源.
